name: Unidentified Attacker November 2018
description: A sigma rule detecting an unidetefied attacker who used phishing emails to target high profile orgs on November 2018. The Actor shares some TTPs with YYTRIUM/APT29 campaign in 2016.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*cyzfc.dat,* AND process.command_line:*PointFunctionCall)`
